body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 4/3/3 Plus/2/1/(2020 Release), Blink Camera Door Mount No-Drill Mounting Bracket Adapter Holder for Apartment

features: 【Anti-Theft Design】We design this anti-theft doorbell door mount for most video doorbells. The door mount provide a safe environment. The anti-theft doorbell door mount it provides a safe environment for your device and 360° protection against theft. Please note: This just a doorbell mount, Doorbell is NOT included.

【Compatible Video Doorbells Mode】Most brands of video doorbells fit perfectly inside.Perfectly fit for Video Doorbell 1, Video Doorbell 2, Video Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3 Plus, Video Doorbell 4, Video Doorbell 2020, Video Doorbell 2021, Video Doorbell pro, Video Doorbell pro2 and most of video doorbells. Maximum 2.63 inches wide x 5.47 inches tall x 1.22 inches depth.

【Compatible Door】Suitable for most kind of Anti-theft door, inward opened door, left or right opened door (outward opened door is not suitable), The thickness of the door must be between 0.6 inches and 2.3 inches. Before ordering, be sure to measure your door thickness to ensure a proper fit.

【No-drilll and Install】Our mount doesn't require drilling or wall damage, making installation a breeze. Simply place your video doorbell in the shell, adjust the fixed clip to fit your door thickness, attach the mount to the door, and secure it with the included screws. It Does not need drill door or wall. Much easy.The product coming with detailed Installation Instructions and other necessary accessories.

【Package Include】: 1x video doorbell mount, installation instructions and various installation accessories. If you encounter any problems with the product or installation, please contact us and we will resolve it for you immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anti-Theft Video Doorbell
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My worries about theft and tampering were put to rest thanks to the durable solution provided with this mounting bracket adapter. This improvement in performance has also put me at ease. As the owner of the Ring Video Doorbell 3, I was happy to find that this mount is designed to fit my device easily and requires no adjustments or modifications. The installation process was really simple. Since I didn't want to go to the trouble of drilling a hole in my back, the fact that this mount doesn't need to be drilled in at all was a huge advantage for me by creating a bracket that allows it to wrap around me properly on the doorbell. This provides a firm grip, discouraging attempts at theft or removal. Even though the weather is very harsh outside, my doorbell can’t come off its mount due to its sturdy design and sturdy materials. This peace of mind is about how durable the mount is and how it protects my investment in the Ring Video Doorbell device itself. Another admirable quality is the mountain’s attention to detail. It maintains the sleek and modern look of the Ring Video Doorbell, which is achieved by integrating seamlessly with the exterior design of my home. The Mount’s aesthetically pleasing design doesn’t come at the expense of performance; Instead, the right balance between form and function achieves the elusive goal of creation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Very secure and very easy to install. No holes or drilling needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secure and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't install my Ring doorbell normally because my screen door frame is metal and I have aluminum siding which I prefer not to drill into if possible, so this seemed like a great solution. It perfectly accommodates the doorbell and the installation is a breeze. It feels secure since the only way to remove the Ring doorbell is by unscrewing the flat bottom panel attached to the door. It's a great alternative to traditional installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This fits the Ring doorbell nicely and it’s easy to install. Seems pretty safe as the only way to take the Ring doorbell is to unscrew the bottom panel which is flat against the door. This fit on all my interior doors however my front door is too thick and it did not fit. I did not measure my front door prior to ordering because there are so many mosquitoes out in humid florida so that was my fault. The listing does provide measurements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would not allow door to close
reviews.reviewText: Triple check your door prior to purchasing this bracket. The backside of the bracket which sits on the inside of the door did not go far enough away from the door jam. This caused the tighten nut to obstruct closure of the door.It appeared to be a solid product however at the end of the day did not function as I anticipated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t fit the type of door bell camera I had.
reviews.reviewText: Overall it was easy to use if you read the instructions comes with a lot of extra parts to fit your specific doorbell camera. My doorbell camera was just slightly to big for it. It’s definitely renter friendly and the metal is durable and not easily break able.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Loved it and actually worked out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fits my blink doorbell camera with no issues. It also fits our front door with no issues.

Me pareció un buen soporte, en mi caso la puerta tiene otra reja, lo cual permite que esté a una distancia donde no es fácil que lo alcancen.Es muy fácil de instalar y queda muy firme, es más costoso que otras opciones pero lo recomiendo.
